overview: Kaitlyn Ashley is the head cheerleader at the Eafa Muffa Day Sorority. Alex Sanders is her vile cheating boyfriend. Sid Deuce is the roommate he's cheating with. And Tabitha and Sindee are as into each other as the game on the field! It all adds up to one raucous rock-off, as we cheer on the cheerers in Pleasure's wild-ass new Sorority Cheerleaders!
title: Sorority Cheerleaders
